subject: RE: [junit] JUnit3.7 Error message
msgSnippet: Sorry Pank I don t know the solution to you problem.  However I used to use VisualCafe 4 and now I have moved to Ant, Jikes and a text editor I suffer less
messageBody:
Sorry Pank I don't know the solution to you problem.  However I used to use VisualCafe 4 and now I have moved to Ant, Jikes and a text editor I suffer less stress.
 
-----Original Message-----
From: Pankaj Solanki [mailto:psolanki@...]
Sent: 05 September 2001 14:18
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] JUnit3.7 Error message

Hi all,
 
Will any of you plz assess, why my SimpleTest.java file is failing :
  
The problem I am facing is:
 
When I compile a junit test file thru' VisualCafe4.0, it gets compiled without any error.
Later while invoking the TestRunner utility from console (any approach - textui, awtui or swingui),
I am getting following error message:
 
java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: junit.framework.Assert: method assert(Ljava/lang/String;Z)V did not used to be static
 
 at junit.samples.SimpleTest.testAdd(SimpleTest.java:32)
 
But surprisingly if I compile the same file from console and run the TestRunner utility then test passes without any error and it show a green bar. Perfect run.
 
My VisualCafe4.0 setting is fine (junit.jar and the directory which contain this jar file is included in the classpath of sc.ini file).
 
Thanks,
 
Pankaj
